TopicTitle: Video Wednesday: The Heat Is On!

Articles.Content: Kurtjmac is back playing Kerbal Space Program, and the heat is on! Considering he hasn’t played KSP in quite a while what tips and tricks would you give him? Which changes over the last year will he need to account for?

1) Ignore the voices screaming "YOU'RE DOING IT ALL WRONG!!!!!!!!1!!!!!1!!!"

...I don't really have a second point.

I'm just having fun watching him rediscover the game. And hopefully he'll figure out what the "new" navball markers and direction selector buttons are for. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

\*Fangirl scream\*

This is awesome for me, because ol' jmac was the first person to really help me get into KSP.
Tip? Remember, Kurt, Kerbals are no longer expendable. The little green men are expensive, now.
How to orbit properly. 10k gravity turn has slightly ruined him already lol
